item.title: No Staking [PI]
item.dc:creator: @akshayp1 akshayp1
item.description:
@akshayp1 wrote:

On my server staking has been disable. Every time you try to put a item into stake window it says “Staking has been disable due to dupes and glitches”. I want staking to be enabled. This is where I found the message “Staking has been disabled due to dupes and glitches”.

Trade And Duel.java

public boolean stakeItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
	
	for (int i : Config.ITEM_TRADEABLE) {
		if(i == itemID) {
			c.sendMessage("You can't stake this item.");
			return false;
		}
            if (!c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Terrence")) {
			c.sendMessage("Staking has been disabled due to dupes and glitches, will be fixed soon.");
	return false;
	}		
	}

How can I make staking enabled?

Read full topic
